description.value:
You are skilled at attacking opponents you can’t clearly see.

Benefit: In melee, every time you miss because of concealment (see page 253), you can reroll your miss chance percentile roll one time to see if you actually hit (see page 243).

You aren’t @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.MZ8OoH1GE9qDMyCD]{Flat-footed} against melee attacks from creatures you can’t see, and you can withdraw from creatures you can’t perceive. You don’t need to attempt Acrobatics checks to move at full speed while @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.conditions.tOpF6qjnlnKc10t7]{Blinded}.
